summary: The OSM increases the image of tags on the map

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.The OSM increases the image of tags on the map What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Hello everybody, I from Russia and badly speak English. I have a problem with a map marker. at the density of the Hdpi 320 screen (standard) my tags of the map become biger then standard osm tags. standard osm tags look well ,but when i use my own images they looks awful (look in attachment). What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? I use OSM 3.0.8 library and an api android slf4j-android-1.6.1-RC1 package
